name: Squid Game (itch) (Brian)
description:
"DESCRIPTION"
watch squids swim or something.

"CONTROLS"
1 to spawn Squid
2 to spawn Worm
Arrow Keys to move camera
Keypad - and Keypad + to zoom in/out
Escape to quit the game

"RATINGS"

"I gotten a virus by downloading this game, but i love it!" -Satisfied Customer
"very satisfying!" -Satisfied Customer
"what am i supposed to say?" -Satisfied Customer
"Sloppy" -Satisfied Customer
"L O N G W O R M" -Satisfied Customer
"i showed this game to my wife and she has reconsidered the divorce" -Satisfied Customer

"CHANGELOG"
0.2
+added randomized size & color for entities
+fixed some bugs
+added worms

"COMING SOON"
